topic.title: Blacklists are automatically disabling after some time
topic.body: Hi, i'm trying to use http://127.0.0.1:43110/13CgSQeywg2ius5pjXVCk7dKUCRkz5xvW3 and http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LgqZfbtr6dukbjHdjWBEmmthq1shEv3y1 blocklists but after some time they just automatically disable... I'm on firefox
